verses.verse: Jacob <S%H3290><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and said: <S%H559><s%> "Gather yourselves together, <S%H622><s%> that I may tell <S%H5046><s%> you that which will happen <S%H7122><s%> to you in the days <S%H3117><s%> to come. <S%H319><s%>
Assemble <S%H6908><s%> yourselves, <S%H8085><s%> and hear, you sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> Listen <S%H8085><s%> to Israel, <S%H3478><s%> your father. <S%H1><s%>

"Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> you are my firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> my might, <S%H3581><s%> and the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of my strength; <S%H202><s%> excelling <S%H3499><s%> in dignity, <S%H7613><s%> and excelling <S%H3499><s%> in power. <S%H5794><s%>

Boiling over as water, <S%H4325><s%> you shall not excel; <S%H3498><s%> because you <S%H2490><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to your <S%H2490><s%> father <S%H1><s%>'s bed, <S%H4904><s%> then defiled it. <S%H5927><s%> He went up to my couch. <S%H3326><s%>
"Simeon <S%H8095><s%> and Levi <S%H3878><s%> are brothers. <S%H251><s%> Their swords <S%H4380><s%> are weapons <S%H3627><s%> of violence. <S%H2555><s%>

My soul, <S%H5315><s%> don't <S%H935><s%> come into their council. <S%H5475><s%> My glory, <S%H3519><s%> don't <S%H3161><s%> be united to their assembly; <S%H6951><s%> for in their anger <S%H639><s%> they killed <S%H2026><s%> men. <S%H376><s%> In their self-will <S%H7522><s%> they hamstrung <S%H6131><s%> cattle. <S%H7794><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be their anger, <S%H639><s%> for it was fierce; <S%H5794><s%> and their wrath, <S%H5678><s%> for it was cruel. <S%H7185><s%> I will divide <S%H2505><s%> them in Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and scatter <S%H6327><s%> them in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"Judah, <S%H3063><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> will praise <S%H3034><s%> you. <S%H3027><s%> Your hand will be on the neck <S%H6203><s%> of your enemies. <S%H341><s%> Your father <S%H1><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> will bow down before you. <S%H7812><s%>

Judah <S%H3063><s%> is a lion <S%H738><s%>'s cub. <S%H1482><s%> From the prey, <S%H2964><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> you have gone up. <S%H5927><s%> He stooped down, <S%H3766><s%> he crouched <S%H7257><s%> as a lion, <S%H3833><s%> as a lioness. <S%H3833><s%> Who will rouse him up? <S%H6965><s%>

The scepter <S%H7626><s%> will not depart <S%H5493><s%> from Judah, <S%H3063><s%> nor the ruler <S%H2710><s%>'s staff from between his feet, <S%H7272><s%> until <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H7886><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> to whom it belongs. <S%H3349><s%> To him will the obedience of the peoples be. <S%H5971><s%>

Binding <S%H631><s%> his foal <S%H5895><s%> to the vine, <S%H1612><s%> his donkey <S%H860><s%>'s colt <S%H1121><s%> to the choice vine; <S%H8321><s%> he has washed <S%H3526><s%> his garments <S%H3830><s%> in wine, <S%H3196><s%> his robes <S%H5497><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of grapes. <S%H6025><s%>
His eyes <S%H5869><s%> will be red <S%H2447><s%> with wine, <S%H3196><s%> his teeth <S%H8127><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> with milk. <S%H2461><s%>

"Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> will dwell <S%H7931><s%> at the haven <S%H2348><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%> He will be for a haven <S%H2348><s%> of ships. <S%H591><s%> His border <S%H3411><s%> will be on Sidon. <S%H6721><s%>
"Issachar <S%H3485><s%> is a strong <S%H1634><s%> donkey, <S%H2543><s%> lying down <S%H7257><s%> between the saddlebags. <S%H4942><s%>

He saw <S%H7200><s%> a resting <S%H4496><s%> place, <S%H2896><s%> that it was good, the land, <S%H776><s%> that it was pleasant. <S%H5276><s%> He bows <S%H5186><s%> his shoulder <S%H7926><s%> to the burden, <S%H5445><s%> and becomes a servant <S%H5647><s%> doing forced labor. <S%H4522><s%>
"Dan <S%H1835><s%> will judge <S%H1777><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Dan <S%H1835><s%> will be a serpent <S%H5175><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> an adder <S%H8207><s%> in the path, <S%H734><s%> That bites <S%H5391><s%> the horse <S%H5483><s%>'s heels, <S%H6119><s%> so that his rider <S%H7392><s%> falls <S%H5307><s%> backward. <S%H268><s%>
I have waited for <S%H6960><s%> your salvation, <S%H3444><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
"A troop <S%H1416><s%> will press <S%H1464><s%> on Gad, <S%H1410><s%> but he will press <S%H1464><s%> on their heel. <S%H6119><s%>
"Asher <S%H836><s%>'s food <S%H3899><s%> will be rich. <S%H8082><s%> He will yield <S%H5414><s%> royal <S%H4428><s%> dainties. <S%H4574><s%>
"Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> is a doe <S%H355><s%> set free, <S%H7971><s%> who bears <S%H5414><s%> beautiful <S%H8233><s%> fawns. <S%H561><s%>

"Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is a fruitful <S%H6509><s%> vine, <S%H1121><s%> a fruitful <S%H6509><s%> vine <S%H1121><s%> by a spring. <S%H5869><s%> His branches <S%H1323><s%> run <S%H6805><s%> over the wall. <S%H7791><s%>
The archers <S%H1167><s%> have severely grieved him, <S%H4843><s%> shot <S%H7232><s%> at him, <S%H7852><s%> and persecute him:

But his bow <S%H7198><s%> remained <S%H3427><s%> strong. <S%H386><s%> The arms <S%H2220><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%> were made strong, <S%H6339><s%> by the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the Mighty <S%H46><s%> One of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> (from there is the shepherd, <S%H7462><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>),

even by the God <S%H410><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> who will help <S%H5826><s%> you; <S%H854><s%> by the Almighty, <S%H7706><s%> who will bless <S%H1288><s%> you, <S%H1293><s%> with blessings of heaven <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H5920><s%> blessings <S%H1293><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%> that lies below, <S%H7257><s%> blessings <S%H1293><s%> of the breasts, <S%H7699><s%> and of the womb. <S%H7356><s%>

The blessings <S%H1293><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%> have prevailed <S%H1396><s%> above the blessings <S%H1293><s%> of your ancestors, <S%H2029><s%> above the boundaries <S%H8379><s%> of the ancient <S%H5769><s%> hills. <S%H1389><s%> They will be on the head <S%H6936><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> on the crown of the head <S%H6936><s%> of him who is separated <S%H5139><s%> from his brothers. <S%H251><s%>

"Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> is a ravenous <S%H2963><s%> wolf. <S%H2061><s%> In the morning <S%H1242><s%> he will devour <S%H398><s%> the prey. <S%H5706><s%> At evening <S%H6153><s%> he will divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil. <S%H7998><s%>"

All these are the twelve <S%H6240><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and this is what their father <S%H1><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them and blessed <S%H1288><s%> them. <S%H1288><s%> He blessed everyone <S%H834><s%> according <S%H376><s%> to his blessing. <S%H1293><s%>

He instructed <S%H6680><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> and said to them, <S%H622><s%> "I am to be gathered to my people. <S%H5971><s%> Bury <S%H6912><s%> me with my fathers <S%H1><s%> in the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%>

in the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Machpelah, <S%H4375><s%> which is before <S%H6440><s%> Mamre, <S%H4471><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> which Abraham <S%H85><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> with the field <S%H7704><s%> from Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%> as a burial <S%H272><s%> place. <S%H6913><s%>

There they buried <S%H6912><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Sarah, <S%H8283><s%> his wife. <S%H802><s%> There they buried <S%H6912><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> and Rebekah, <S%H7259><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> and there I buried <S%H6912><s%> Leah: <S%H3812><s%>
the field <S%H7704><s%> and the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is therein, <S%H4735><s%> which was purchased from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Heth. <S%H2845><s%>"

When Jacob <S%H3290><s%> made an end <S%H3615><s%> of charging <S%H6680><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> he gathered up <S%H622><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%> into the bed, <S%H4296><s%> and yielded up the spirit, <S%H1478><s%> and was gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people. <S%H5971><s%>
